label: 異国警固番役
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
見出し読み: いこくけいごばんやく
説明文: Obligatory tour of military duty in the Kyushu region imposed on the military governors (shugo) and other regional powers by the Kamakura bakufu. The obligation involved mustering a combined unit of vassals from two or three provinces of the region, usually for three months of duty.　[守護]
